descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Bleeping Spaceships MR is a mixed reality bullet-hell arcade game where your living room transforms into an explosive battlefield! Pilot your starfighter from your hand using intuitive VR motion controls. Blast enemies, dodge split-second barrages, and master dozens of handcrafted levels and challenges.

Play in Mixed Reality or Virtual Reality—with adjustable tinting so you can keep your room visible or dive into a darker, more immersive experience. This isn’t just procedural chaos—every stage is handcrafted to test your skills and reflexes.

Game Features:
⚡ Mixed Reality or VR Modes – Choose your play style and customize your environment.

🎮 Intuitive Motion Controls – Your hand is your ship. Dodge, aim, and power up in real time.

🌌 32 Handcrafted Stages – Built for challenge, flow, and replayability.

🔥 5 Play Modes – From classic arcade to hardcore score chasing.

👾 4 Epic Bosses – Each with unique mechanics and patterns.

💥 27 Distinct Enemies – No filler, just pure chaotic variety.

🚀 4 Upgradeable Secondary Weapons – Including Multi-Strike, Invulnerability, Slowmo, and Blast Missile.

🏆 Leaderboards and Stage Ranks – Earn your spot and chase perfection.

Bleeping Spaceships MR delivers classic arcade action re-imagined with cutting-edge mixed reality. Whether dodging through real-world furniture or blasting off in full VR, it’s time to light up the sky.

Yes, you can pet the dog*. 

*Dog not included
